item.title: Mentioned by Macleans.ca
item.description:
No joke: The staying power of MP Ruth Ellen Brosseau
Nearly two years into the Ruth Ellen Brosseau Experiment, she is still the unlikeliest of MPs—an assistant pub manager who was just a name on a ballot in the 2011 federal election, who had never set foot in her riding northeast of Montreal, and who famously ...

item.description:
